text: Naujawan () may refer to: * Naujawan (1937 film), a 1937 Bollywood film by Aspi Irani * Naujawan (1951 film), a Hindi film by Mahesh Kaul * Naujawan Bharat Sabha, a left-wing Indian association == See also == * Chal Chal Re Naujawan, a 1944 Indian film * Hum Naujawan, a 1985 Indian film
title: Naujawan
